verses.verse: Oh give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> for He is good; <S%H2896><s%> For His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is everlasting. <S%H5769><s%>
Let the redeemed <S%H1350><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> say <S%H559><s%> [so], Whom <S%H834><s%> He has redeemed <S%H1350><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the adversary, <S%H6862><s%>
And gathered <S%H6908><s%> from the lands, <S%H776><s%> From the east <S%H4217><s%> and from the west, <S%H4628><s%> From the north <S%H6828><s%> and from the south. <S%H3220><s%>

They wandered <S%H8582><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in a desert <S%H3452><s%> region; <S%H3452><s%> They did not find <S%H4672><s%> a way <S%H1870><s%> to an inhabited <S%H4186><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>
[They were] hungry <S%H7457><s%> and thirsty; <S%H6771><s%> Their soul <S%H5315><s%> fainted <S%H5848><s%> within them.
Then they cried <S%H6817><s%> out to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble; <S%H9496><s%> He delivered <S%H5337><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He led <S%H1869><s%> them also by a straight <S%H3477><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> To go <S%H1980><s%> to an inhabited <S%H4186><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>
Let them give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for His lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> And for His wonders <S%H6381><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>

For He has satisfied <S%H7646><s%> the thirsty <S%H8264><s%> soul, <S%H5315><s%> And the hungry <S%H7457><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> He has filled <S%H4390><s%> with what <S%H9185><s%> is good. <S%H9185><s%>
There were those who dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H2822><s%> and in the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death, <S%H6757><s%> Prisoners <S%H615><s%> in misery <S%H6040><s%> and chains, <S%H1270><s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> they had rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against the words <S%H561><s%> of God, <S%H410><s%> And spurned <S%H5006><s%> the counsel <S%H6098><s%> of the Most <S%H9411><s%> High. <S%H9411><s%>
Therefore He humbled <S%H3665><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> with labor; <S%H5999><s%> They stumbled <S%H3782><s%> and there <S%H369><s%> was none <S%H369><s%> to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Then they cried <S%H2199><s%> out to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble; <S%H9496><s%> He saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He brought <S%H3318><s%> them out of darkness <S%H2822><s%> and the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death, <S%H6757><s%> And broke <S%H5423><s%> their bands <S%H4147><s%> apart. <S%H5423><s%>
Let them give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for His lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> And for His wonders <S%H6381><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
For He has shattered <S%H7665><s%> gates <S%H1817><s%> of bronze, <S%H5178><s%> And cut <S%H1438><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%> asunder. <S%H1438><s%>
Fools, <S%H191><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of their rebellious <S%H6588><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> And because <S%H4480><s%> of their iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> were afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>
Their soul <S%H5315><s%> abhorred <S%H8581><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> kinds of food; <S%H400><s%> And they drew <S%H5060><s%> near <S%H5060><s%> to the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
Then they cried <S%H2199><s%> out to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble; <S%H9496><s%> He saved <S%H3467><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> His word <S%H1697><s%> and healed <S%H7495><s%> them, And delivered <S%H4422><s%> [them] from their destructions. <S%H7825><s%>
Let them give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for His lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> And for His wonders <S%H6381><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
Let them also offer <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> And tell <S%H5608><s%> of His works <S%H4639><s%> with joyful <S%H7440><s%> singing. <S%H7440><s%>
Those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the sea <S%H3220><s%> in ships, <S%H591><s%> Who do <S%H6213><s%> business <S%H4399><s%> on great <S%H7227><s%> waters; <S%H4325><s%>
They have seen <S%H7200><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And His wonders <S%H6381><s%> in the deep. <S%H4688><s%>
For He spoke <S%H559><s%> and raised <S%H5975><s%> up a stormy <S%H9370><s%> wind, <S%H7307><s%> Which lifted <S%H7311><s%> up the waves <S%H1530><s%> of the sea.

They rose <S%H5927><s%> up to the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> they went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the depths; <S%H8415><s%> Their soul <S%H5315><s%> melted <S%H4127><s%> away in [their] misery. <S%H9567><s%>
They reeled <S%H2287><s%> and staggered <S%H5128><s%> like a drunken <S%H7910><s%> man, <S%H7910><s%> And were at their wits' end. <S%H1104><s%>
Then they cried <S%H6817><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> in their trouble, <S%H9496><s%> And He brought <S%H3318><s%> them out of their distresses. <S%H4691><s%>
He caused <S%H6965><s%> the storm <S%H9370><s%> to be still, <S%H1827><s%> So that the waves <S%H1530><s%> of the sea were hushed. <S%H2814><s%>
Then they were glad <S%H8055><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they were quiet; <S%H8367><s%> So He guided <S%H5148><s%> them to their desired <S%H2656><s%> haven. <S%H4231><s%>
Let them give <S%H3034><s%> thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> for His lovingkindness, <S%H2617><s%> And for His wonders <S%H6381><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>
Let them extol <S%H7311><s%> Him also in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> And praise <S%H1984><s%> Him at the seat <S%H4186><s%> of the elders. <S%H2205><s%>
He changes <S%H7760><s%> rivers <S%H5104><s%> into a wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> And springs <S%H4161><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> into a thirsty <S%H6774><s%> ground; <S%H6774><s%>
A fruitful <S%H6529><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into a salt <S%H4420><s%> waste, <S%H4420><s%> Because <S%H4480><s%> of the wickedness <S%H9567><s%> of those who dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it.
He changes <S%H7760><s%> a wilderness <S%H4057><s%> into a pool <S%H98><s%> of water, <S%H4325><s%> And a dry <S%H6723><s%> land <S%H776><s%> into springs <S%H4161><s%> of water; <S%H4325><s%>
And there <S%H8033><s%> He makes the hungry <S%H7457><s%> to dwell, <S%H3427><s%> So that they may establish <S%H3559><s%> an inhabited <S%H4186><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%>
And sow <S%H2232><s%> fields, <S%H7704><s%> and plant <S%H5193><s%> vineyards, <S%H3754><s%> And gather <S%H6213><s%> a fruitful <S%H6529><s%> harvest. <S%H8393><s%>
Also He blesses <S%H1288><s%> them and they multiply <S%H7235><s%> greatly; <S%H3966><s%> And He does not let their cattle <S%H929><s%> decrease. <S%H4591><s%>
When they are diminished <S%H4591><s%> and bowed <S%H7817><s%> down <S%H7817><s%> Through <S%H4480><s%> oppression, <S%H6115><s%> misery, <S%H9567><s%> and sorrow, <S%H3015><s%>
He pours <S%H8210><s%> contempt <S%H937><s%> upon princes, <S%H5081><s%> And makes them wander <S%H8582><s%> in a pathless <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1870><s%> waste. <S%H8414><s%>

But He sets <S%H7682><s%> the needy <S%H34><s%> securely <S%H7682><s%> on high <S%H7682><s%> away from affliction, <S%H6040><s%> And makes <S%H7760><s%> [his] families <S%H4940><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>
The upright <S%H3477><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> it, and are glad; <S%H8055><s%> But all <S%H3605><s%> unrighteousness <S%H9390><s%> shuts <S%H7092><s%> its mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is wise <S%H2450><s%>? Let him give <S%H8104><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to these <S%H428><s%> things; <S%H428><s%> And consider <S%H995><s%> the lovingkindnesses <S%H2617><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
